Subject: Valtron or Galvatron-Civil War
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107

 Valtron fell to the ground in the valley. He had been searching for his true 
spark for 6 months now. He went into a deep sleep. He went into a dream 
state. He was in his blue dragon mode. He looked up and shaked in disbelief. 
It was Himself Galvatron in his silver dragon form. He cired out "NO!!!!!!!" 
he flew at the bot his fire mouth blazing. The civil War had begun.
